com.amplifyframework.api.aws.sigv4

Class AppSyncV4Signer

  • java.lang.Object
    • AWS4Signer
      • com.amplifyframework.api.aws.sigv4.AppSyncV4Signer

  • public final class AppSyncV4Signer
extends AWS4Signer
    Signer that signs the request with AppSync-specific service name and region.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AppSyncV4Signer(java.lang.String region)
      Construct an instance of SigV4 signer for AppSync service using default resource path.
      AppSyncV4Signer(java.lang.String region, boolean isWebSocketConnectionWithIam)
      Construct an instance of SigV4 signer for AppSync with an explicit flag whether it's signing for a connection request via AWS IAM or not.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AppSyncV4Signer

        public AppSyncV4Signer(java.lang.String region)
        Construct an instance of SigV4 signer for AppSync service using default resource path.
        Parameters:
        region - the signer region

      • AppSyncV4Signer

        public AppSyncV4Signer(java.lang.String region,
                       boolean isWebSocketConnectionWithIam)
        Construct an instance of SigV4 signer for AppSync with an explicit flag whether it's signing for a connection request via AWS IAM or not. A signer that is created with this flag set to true will append "/connect" to its resource path.
        Parameters:
        region - the signer region
        isWebSocketConnectionWithIam - true if signing for web socket connection request with AWS IAM authentication
